action: Initialized AoS Tools Bootstrap v1 repo skeleton, schemas, registries, roadmap.
Added v2 unify/batch scanning script + inbox drop-zone + batch_plan registry + review report schemas + STAGE_003 roadmap item.

provenance.notes: v2 increment; maintains v1 locks within project_bootstrap.

action: Reviewed AoS archive schemas and runtime packages; documented findings in assistant response.

provenance.notes: Review-only change set; no code or schema files modified.

action: Updated envelope builder to emit canonical target/transport/payload shape with schema-valid defaults.
Initialized git repository, added GitHub remote, committed, and pushed to origin/main.

provenance.notes: Git init/push operational step; no content changes beyond repository metadata.

action: Correction: prior git init/push ledger entry listed .gitignore which does not exist; treat only .git/ metadata as artifact.
Ingested AoS v5.1 envelope and temporal scene contracts and documented Foreman strictness alignment gaps.

provenance.notes: Analysis/docs update to prepare remediation plan.

action: Implemented P0 remediation with strict /chat envelope validation and handler extraction of execution/tasks domains.

provenance.notes: Gateway now rejects invalid payloads and handler returns domain extraction output.

action: Implemented P1 remediation: version gate for envelope schemas, conditional requirements enforcement, and Foreman stack README updates.

provenance.notes: Default strict mode is v5.1-only; legacy support controlled by AOS_ALLOW_LEGACY_SCHEMAS.

action: Implemented STAGE_010 in-process task runner and content generation MVP returning v5.1 task_result envelopes.

provenance.notes: Synchronous MVP execution loop over embedded_master_meta.tasks.tasks with planning/generation handlers.

action: Implemented STAGE_011 tool registry adapter and capability lookup for local in-process engine dispatch.

provenance.notes: Engine now resolves task_type->tool via tools_catalog.jsonl and dispatches by tool URN handlers.

action: Implemented STAGE_012 integration tests and MVP demo client for strict v5.1 Foreman flow.

provenance.notes: Adds one-command pytest verification and demo client proof-of-life.
